entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Compat doesn't validate changes to structs that would break compat #43628
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] DiscordChatExporter build with warning：‘ServicePointManager' is obsolete: 'WebRequest, HttpWebRequest, ServicePoint, and WebClient are obsolete. #43621
  • Default Uri is wrong when dotnet publish docker image to insecure registry #43618

Closed

  • Value objects: ToString override is not inherited #43617
  • [WebToolsE2E] After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2, an error "MSB4018: The "DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly." in the Error List when create ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages) or MVC 6.0/8.0 IndAuth project. #43407

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43631
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #43626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43619
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • UpdateNuGetConfigPackageSourcesMappings: don't add empty mappings #43616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude false positive license ref for fsharp patch #43623
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • insert 9.0.2xx into the codeflow #43608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2545310 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report msbuild diagnostics as warnings/errors. #43571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix parsing of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Pass official build id props via /p: #43520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime, dotnet/aspnetcore and windowsdesktop codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
